title: "Fire and/or emergency alarm system" means an arrangement of call points or detectors, sounders and other equipment for the transmission and indication of alarm signals, activated automatically or manually in the case of fire or other emergency
clause_text: "Fire and/or emergency alarm system" means an arrangement of call points or detectors, sounders and other equipment for the transmission and indication of alarm signals, activated automatically or manually in the case of fire or other emergency.
